ModMetaData.name: [JDS] The Forge - Barrows Brothers
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]
"The Barrows brothers were a band of six legendary Saradominist warriors who ventured into Morytania during the God Wars, leading the Morytania Campaign. Their fate is revealed in the crumbling tome. They struck a deal with a mysterious stranger for power, and after their deaths, the Stranger came to 'collect' them, and they were buried in six burial mounds, or Barrows, in eastern Morytania, giving them their collective name." -Old School RuneScape Wiki
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Nt5i0p3.png[/img] ~[JDS] The Forge - Anvil ~ This mod
[img]https://i.imgur.com/KllKflV.png[/img] Armor and Weapons for -Ahrim the Blighted -Dharok the Wretched -Guthan the Infested -Karil the Tainted -Torag the Corrupted -Verac the Defiled
[img]https://i.imgur.com/dsouLiu.png[/img] - Jagex for making "Runescape
